note.p: Servant. Perhaps a servant at 14 Brunswick Square, 1841. Footman at 25 Bloomsbury Square, 1851; at 16 Onslow Square, Kensington, 1861. Francis Galton’s butler at 42 Rutland Gate, Knightsbridge, 1871. Living with his sister in Hatcliffe almshouses, Lewisham, 1881; 19 Ladywell Park, Lewisham, 1891.

Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/682/4/20/35), 1851 (HO107/1507/312/ 9), 1861 (RG9/21/81/9), 1871 (RG10/131/18/29), 1881 (RG11/735/88/2), 1891 (RG12/520/194/21)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 8 June 2020)
